subtask.title: Design Practical Beginner Projects
subtask.objective: Create a set of simple, hands-on projects that illustrate fundamental AI concepts for beginners.
subtask.scope: Projects could include basic data analysis, simple machine learning models, or AI programming exercises.

verification.completion_summary: The research findings focus on advanced AI concepts such as AI agents, RAG models, cloud deployment, and AI in software engineering, rather than beginner projects illustrating fundamental AI concepts as originally specified.

covered_aspects: discussions on AI agents, language models, and deployment workflows
missing_aspects: hands-on beginner projects demonstrating core AI concepts

quality_assessment.depth: moderate to high for advanced topics, insufficient for beginner-level projects

missing_requirements: creation of simple, hands-on beginner projects
illustrations of fundamental AI concepts suitable for beginners
